DOC.criteria: Subject male female age 20 45 year age ( inclusive ) Subject normal body weight determined bodymass index ( BMI ) 18 28 kg/m2 Subject healthy determine EA ( medical history , physical examination , skin evaluation , vital sign , ECG , hematology , clinical chemistry , urinalysis ) Subject surgically sterile ; subject postmenopausal least 12 consecutive month female ; subject agree remain abstinent follow two acceptable method birth control EA end observation period . ( fore male female subject ) Subject history complication epilepsy and/or seizure Subject clinically relevant change ECG , second thirddegree AV block , complete bundle branch block , prolongation QRS complex 120 m , QTcB ( QT interval correct HR BazettÂ´s formula ) 500 m EA Subject clinically relevant hepatic dysfunction Subject clinically relevant renal dysfunction Subject history significant skin hypersensitivity adhesives transdermal product recent unresolved contact dermatitis Subject history complication atopic eczematous dermatitis , psoriasis , and/or active skin disease skin tumor Subject 1 know suspected drug hypersensitivity , particular component trial medication Subject history chronic alcohol drug abuse within last 5 year Subject test positive HIV1/2Ab , HBsAg HCVAb Subject test positive alcohol and/or drug EA Subject take prohibited concomitant medication Subject history complication narrow angle glaucoma Subject history complication respiratory cardiovascular disorder ( e.g. , heart failure , coronary heart disease , hypertension , arrhythmia , tachyarrhythmia , myocardial infarction ) Subject history complication psychic abnormality , psychiatric neurologic illness , autonomic neuropathy Subject history complication diabetes mellitus and/or thyroid dysfunction , especially hyperthyroidism endocrine disorder Subject history complication malignancy
